M.J. Grant Today I learned...

Heroku Apps Today

Written by MJ Grant on August 10, 2014.

Today I learned how to set up Heroku, tie it to a github project, and use it to stand up a simple blog app.

Some gotchas: don’t directly edit the css, the build process will clobber it with scss contents.

Don’t edit dist or tmp directly. Edit the source - think of dist and tmp as compiled code.

Before we use heroku, we need a server. grunt build is essential to success.

The Case of the Missing CSS

Written by John Smith on August 12, 2012.

Why does this site lack its css file?

I must need to build it again. Build using grunt build.
